hanzi-su-wiki:
飯

Значения

Варёный рис, еда, пища

Мнемоника

  • Еду 食 при готовке мешают и переворачивают 反.

  • "Они выступают против 反 моей привычки есть 食 много риса."

Варианты

饭

heisig_chinese_memo: I'm against fastfood. Sit down and eat a real meal!
heisig_constituent: meal, eat, food, umbrella, good, halo, drop, silver, anti-, demonstration, cliff, crotch

jp_example_words:
昼飯(ちゅうはん): lunch, midday meal
飯(めし): meal(s), food
夕飯(ゆうはん): dinner
朝御飯(あさごはん): breakfast
御飯(ごはん): rice (cooked), meal
晩御飯(ばんごはん): dinner, evening meal
昼御飯(ひるごはん): lunch, midday meal
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you're anti-eat your meal will just sit in front of you, uneaten. Food is meant to be eaten! Stop trying to fast and take a bite.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look down at the huge meal in front of you. I guess there are plenty of reasons to be anti-eat right now, but you'll have to eat your food eventually.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you stare at the meal, Han (はん) Solo appears before you and takes a bite! This is what happens if you don't eat your food, someone else will eat it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture Han Solo slowly eating your whole meal! He's making constant eye contact with you, reaching down and shoving the entire meal into his mouth.
Ru_trainchinese: fàn: (сущ) еда, пища; вареный рис или другие зерновые
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you're anti (反) eating (飠) boiled rice
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I'm against fast food. Let's sit down and have a real meal!
humanum_full_description_en: See the term "fanzhe month" in the inscriptions in bronze , which is the name of the month in Qi State. It is unknown which month it is. The son of the earthen axe pot: "Gongsun [Xueyan] (stove) is a year old, and the rice is the month, and the son of the earth axe (makes) a (zhong) ginger-like (pan) pot."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions from " food " to " anti ", " anti " is a sound symbol. The original meaning refers to eating, and later extended to mean the rice eaten. "Shuowen": "Meals, food. From the food back to the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Eating also means eating. The original meaning of this rice. The extension of what you eat is rice.
humanum_full_description: 金文見「飯者月」一詞，是齊國的月名，究竟是哪一月份，不詳。公子土斧壺：「公孫[穴焅](灶)立事歲，飯者月，公子土斧乍(作)子中(仲)姜□之般(盤)壺。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「食」從「反」，「反」是聲符。本義指進食，後來引申表示所吃的米飯。《說文》：「飯，食也。从食反聲。」段玉裁注：「食也者，謂食之也。此飯之本義也。引伸之所食為飯。」

②泛指人每天定時分次喫的食物：早飯。飯菜。飯館。飯量。酒囊飯袋。
③喫飯，或給人飯喫：“飯疏食飲水，曲肱而枕之，樂亦在其中矣”。
④喂牲畜：飯牛。

飯字的基本解释

飯
fàn
见“饭”。

飯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fàn］
［《廣韻》扶晚切，上阮，奉。］
“饭1”的繁体字。亦作“飰1”。
(1)吃饭。
(2)泛指吃。
(3)给饭吃，使吃饭。
(4)指使吃。
(5)指饭含。古丧礼，以玉、珠、米、贝等物纳于死者之口。《礼记·檀弓上》：“飯，設飾。”陆德明释文：“飯，煩晚反，唅也。”汉班固《白虎通·崩薨》：“故天子飯以玉，諸侯以珠，大夫以米，士以貝也。”一说专指以碎玉杂米填实死者之口。
[②]［fàn］
［《廣韻》符万切，去願，奉。］
“饭2”的繁体字。亦作“飰2”。亦作“1”。
(1)煮熟的谷类食品。多指大米干饭。
(2)指每天定时吃的食物。
(3)量词。一餐。
(4)谓手大指的最下处。

飯字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　飯； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1417第27
【廣韻】扶晚切【集韻】【韻會】父遠切，?音笲。【玉篇】餐飯也。【禮·曲禮】飯黍毋以箸。又【文王世子】文王一飯亦一飯，文王再飯亦再飯。　又【儀禮·少牢饋食禮·尸又食註】或言食，或言飯。食，大名，小數曰飯。【疏】食大名者，以其論語文多言食，故云食大名也。小數曰飯者，此少牢特言三飯五飯九飯之等，據一口謂之一飯，五口謂之五飯等，據小數而言，故云小數曰飯。　又【論語】亞飯、三飯、四飯。【註】以樂侑食之官。【白虎通】王者平旦食、晝食、晡食、暮食，凡四飯，諸侯三飯，大夫再飯。　又指本。【儀禮·士喪禮】設決麗于掔自飯持之。【註】麗，施也。掔手後節中也。飯，大擘指本也。決，以韋爲之籍，有彄，彄內端爲紐，外端有橫帶，設之以紐，擐大擘指本也。　又【唐韻】符萬切【集韻】【韻會】扶萬切【正韻】符諫切，?煩去聲。【說文】食也。【汲冢周書】黃帝始炊穀爲飯。【禮·曲禮】毋摶飯。【疏】取飯作摶，則易得多。是欲爭飽非謙也。　又【儀禮·公食大夫禮】賔升，公揖退于箱，賔卒食，會飯三飲

飯字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
飯字的起名意思

暂无。

rice
Basic explanation of words
rice
fàn
See "Rice".
rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fàn］
["Guangyun" help the evening cut, go to Ruan, Feng. ]
Traditional characters for "饭1". Also known as "飰1".
(1) Eat.
(2) Generally refers to eating.
(3) Give food and make food.
(4) Instruct to eat.
(5) Refers to rice containing. In ancient funerals, jade, beads, rice, shells and other things were brought into the mouth of the dead. "Book of Rites·Tan Gong Shang": "Meals, decorations." Lu Deming explained: "Meals, annoying late, but also ill." Han Bangu "Baihutong·Bengxiu": "So the emperor uses jade for rice, and princes use pearls. , The doctor uses rice, and the scholar uses shellfish." One theory refers to the use of broken jade and mixed rice to fill the mouth of the deceased.
[②]［fàn］
["Guangyun" Fu Wanqie, go to wish, give. ]
Traditional characters for "饭2". Also known as "飰2". Also called "1".
(1) Cooked cereals. Refers to dried rice.
(2) Refers to the food eaten regularly every day.
(3) Quantifiers. A meal.
(4) The bottom of the big finger of the hand.
rice

[Xujixia] [Food Character Department] 　fan; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 1417 27
[Guang Yun] Help the evening cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Father cut far away,? Yin 笲. [Jade articles] Meals are also. 【Rite·Song Ceremony】Rice rice is not a chopstick. Also [Wen Wang Shi Zi] Wen Wang has one meal and another meal, and Wen Wang has another meal and another meal.　[Rituals·Shao Lao Feeding Ceremony·Shi You Shi Note】Or Yanshi, or Yanfan. Food, the name, the decimal is called rice. [Sparse] Those who eat famous names often speak more in their Analects, so they are also famous for eating famous names. Those who count as a small number say rice, this Shaolao specifically says that there are three meals, five meals, nine meals, etc., according to one mouthful, one rice, and five mouthfuls, five rice, etc., according to decimals, so cloud decimals say rice.　[The Analects] Asian rice, three rice, four rice. [Note] An official who is happy to eat. 【Baihutong】The king eats daily meals, day meals, ashe meals, evening meals, where four meals, three princes meals, and the doctor eats again.　 Refers to this again. [Rituals·Funerals] Set up Li Yuyi to take care of it by herself. [Note] Li, Shi Ye. Also in the back section. Fan, the big break refers to this also. Judgment, with Wei as the home, there is a 彄, the inner end of the 彄 is a button, and the outer end has a horizontal band, which is set to be a button, and it is a big break to refer to the book.　 [Tang Yun] Fu Wanqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fu Wanqie [Zheng Yun] Fu Jianqie, please go away. [Said Wen] Food also. [Jizhong Zhoushu] The Yellow Emperor began to cook the valley for food. 【Rite·Mixed Ritual】Do not knead the rice. 【Sparse】It is much easier to take rice for tufting. It is the desire to fight for the unsatisfactory.　[Ritual Ceremony·Public Food Doctor’s Ceremony] The bladder rises, the male retreats to the box, the bladder eats, and three drinks

飯

Значения

Варёный рис, еда, пища

Мнемоника

  • Еду 食 при готовке мешают и переворачивают 反.

  • "Они выступают против 反 моей привычки есть 食 много риса."

Варианты

饭

Radicals: 食, 反  (eat, anti)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you're anti-eat your meal will just sit in front of you, uneaten. Food is meant to be eaten! Stop trying to fast and take a bite.
Look down at the huge meal in front of you. I guess there are plenty of reasons to be anti-eat right now, but you'll have to eat your food eventually.
Reading Mnemonic
As you stare at the meal, Han (はん) Solo appears before you and takes a bite! This is what happens if you don't eat your food, someone else will eat it.
Picture Han Solo slowly eating your whole meal! He's making constant eye contact with you, reaching down and shoving the entire meal into his mouth.
